name: AppsFuel
tag_list: mobile, app-store, html5, mobile-app, javascript, device-independent, telco-billing-api
description: AppsFuel is a mobile internet app store.
overview:
AppsFuel is a mobile internet app store featuring only top quality HTML5 apps. Appsfuel is device and OS independent.

When discovering apps on AppsFuel, users can browse a rich and curated offer, read reviews, find their favourite apps and share them on social media, knowing all their friends can use them, because AppsFuel apps work on any smartphone. For developers, AppsFuel is an open and simple marketplace for distribution of mobile web applications and monetization via carrier billing, an exclusive feature of AppsFuel.

By joining AppsFuel, developers will enjoy an unprecedented direct connection to their customers, no approval process and always providing them the latest version, as well as the flexible payment options of carrier billing. What’s more, the “write once, deploy everywhere” nature of the platform reduces the cost of creating, versioning and maintaining applications. AppsFuel is an independent initiative backed by Buongiorno, a wholly-owned subsidiary of NTT DOCOMO.

For more information, please contact: team@appsfuel.com
